message.content:
cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.AI, cs.SI, cs.DB 

This paper proposes a framework for collaborative filtering based recommender systems that utilizes a knowledge graph to capture inter-item relatedness. The paper focuses on the machine learning aspect of the framework, specifically the use of Knowledge Graph Convolutional Networks (KGCN) to automatically discover high-order structure information and semantic information of the KG. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.LG (Machine Learning). However, the paper also discusses the use of the KG for recommendation purposes, which suggests that it could also belong to cs.IR (Information Retrieval) or cs.DB (Databases). Additionally, the paper's focus on exploiting additional information about users and items suggests that it could belong to cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) or cs.SI (Social and Information Networks).
